entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EnsureCapacity() on List<> increments the version #82455
  • Add necessary symbol key information to crash reports #82448
    8.0.0
  • Some of NativeAOT tests are disabled after sharing test cases with ILLink #82447
    8.0.0
  • consider running all pipelines on eng/ updates #82436
  • Regressions in System.Net.NetworkInformation.Tests.PhysicalAddressTests on 2/19/2023 #82442
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_SByte 2/18/2023 #82441
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_Decimal on 2/17/2023 #82440
  • Regressions in System.Diagnostics.Perf_Process on 2/17/2023 #82439
  • LdapConnection stop working after 15minutes of inactivity #82430
  • Mono runtime does not raise open file limit on Linux #82428
  • Parallel.ForEachAsync edge case deadlock #82427
  • enum_packedSlotLayout_NameHashMask is unused #82425
    8.0.0
  • [Linux, amd64] ICorDebugEval::Abort are broken. #82422
    8.0.0
  • Dynamically loaded DLL is missing symbols on Android and iOS #82417
  • Too much Gen0 memory usage on Region GC #82416
  • Test failure baseservices/threading/generics/WaitCallback/thread24/thread24.sh #82414

Closed

  • NativeAOT xml support has to be able to understand cecil format for types #73083
    8.0.0
  • [GeneratedRegex] Unexpected performance from generated regex. #82113
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/bigevent/bigevent/bigevent.sh #82251
    Future
  • Look into DBI/DAC EnumerateModules performance under windbg's ClrComposition extension #82137
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal] Expose missing BinaryPrimitives APIs #72107
    Future
  • Every connection to Kestrel suddenly timing out, part of the application seems "frozen" #79446
    8.0.0
  • Client Certificate does not work on .NET 6.0 on MacOS #80490
    6.0.x
  • Prefer string.Equals over string.Compare(string, string) == 0 or != 0 #34514
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 18 Regressions on 10/11/2022 6:23:40 AM #78807
  • PS7.3 (using .NET 7) locks up when used with screen on Linux and macOS #82110
  • [Questions] How to know the latest installed dotnet sdk version on a non sdk style project file like .vcxproj #81899
  • NativeAOT Data flow annotations are not applied to DI created generic types #81358
  • NativeAOT and DependencyInjection is broken #81779
  • Extra ILC warnings when PublishAOT=true on method already marked RequiresUnreferencedCode #75898
    8.0.0
  • polymorphic serialization/deserialization in System.Text.Json #82400
  • HttpClientFactoryServiceCollectionExtensions multiple implementations #81749
  • Turning on LLVM compilation causes app crash on start up #74021
    8.0.0
  • System.TypeInitializationException: PosixSignalRegistration at Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.HostingAbstractionsHostExtensions.Run(IHost host) #80686
    Future
  • [wasm] `System.Reflection.Tests.MethodInfoTests.TestFunctionPointers` failing with AOT on linux #82272
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasi] Don't provision wasmtime on CI #82454
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-wasi
  • Remove S.S.Permissions reference from S.DirectoryServices #82453
    breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Add pool provider template reference #82452
    NO-MERGE
  • Let GenTreeCopyOrReload handle scenarios when FEATURE_MULTIREG_RET is disabled #82451
  • WIP: Refactor `Interop.LocalAlloc` #82450
    community-contribution
  • Add NT_SIGINFO NOTE to ELF dumps #82449
  • let user know working directory will be used as content root path by default #82445
    community-contribution
  • Wasi icu load test #82444
  • [NativeAOT] Cache and reuse some allocations during Linq.Expression evaluation. #82443
  • Replace some use of string.CompareOrdinal with string == #82438
  • Run check before generating the config file #82435
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Store Parallel.ForEachAsync exceptions from cancellation callbacks #82434
  • [release/6.0] System.Console: allow terminfo files to be larger than 4KiB. #82433
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Console, 6.0.16
  • [release/7.0] Console.Unix: fix escape sequence for setting title on 'screen' TERM. #82432
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Console, 7.0.5
  • [mono] Raise soft RLIMIT_NOFILE on Linux #82429
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] redesign the compare and condition-branch. #82426
    community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Only generate unbox trampolines for virtual valuetype met… #82424
  • [Mono] Add initial arm64 hardware intrinsics support for mini JIT #82420
  • [mono][jit] Refactor SIMD type detection. #82419
  • Fixing a FATAL_GC_ERROR in loh_allocate_in_condemned when in extremely low memory #82418
  • Mark some internal/private structs as readonly #82415
  • Fixing a bug that causes us to mistakenly demote a gen2 region to gen0 #82413

Merged

  • Add LoaderAllocator as a dac/sos concept #82437
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono] Use more idiomatic cmake style #82182
    area-Build-mono
  • Replace `SafeLocalAllocHandle` in `System.Net.HttpListener` #82411
  • Expose missing BinaryPrimitives APIs #82310
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix GetHashCode implementation for InterproceduralState #82431
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [RISC-V] others except coreclr #82382
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add test that uses the host's fallback RID #82076
    area-Host
  • Console.Unix: fix escape sequence for setting title on 'screen' TERM. #82340
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • Fix generic parameter data flow validation in NativeAOT #82392
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • SPMI: Indent details sections via CSS #82375
  • [mono] Disable few quaternion intrinsics #82410
  • [mono][wasm] Fix ldftn in AOT mode, it should return a ftndesc. #82282
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Build test tree with partial trimming #82157
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove fixed test from issues.targets #82378
  • [mono][wasi] Bump wasmtime to 5.0.0 #82390
  • Update linux-instructions.md #82409
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • provide custom marshaller for USER_INFO_1 #82350
    community-contribution
  • Add Microsoft.NET.ILLink package #82407
    linkable-framework, 8.0.0
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2119865 #81871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add bundle tests that don't use the SDK #81187
    area-Host
  • [wasi] Add `WasiAppBuilder` task #82126
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • [JIT] X86 - Always skip emitting 'and reg0, -1' on x86 #82276
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] X64 - Extend emitter peephole optimization of eliminating unnecessary `mov` instructions #79381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Share test cases for NativeAOT #82216
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Remove S.S.Permissions reference from S.C.ConfigurationManager #82259
    area-System.Configuration, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Create source generator for ConfigurationBinder #82179
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Update ILLink wording #82050
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] On importing a CEE_INITOBJ for a simd, construct a VecCon(0) #81982
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for dumping native stacks with cdb #82189
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Prevent use of null when processing ALPN list #81797
    area-System.Net.Security, blocked, os-linux, 7.0.x
  • Convert all usages of target_link_libraries to use PUBLIC/PRIVATE specifiers #81924
    area-Infrastructure
  • [NativeAOT] Implement thunk page generation and mapping for iOS-like platforms #82317
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Initial emscripten 3.1.30 support #81215
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Fix passing Mac Catalyst -target flag to .mm builds #82292
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Enable dedup on tvOS device + arm64 simulators #82403
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Add System.Globalization.Native builds for iOS-like platforms #82393
    os-ios, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • corehost: derive fallback rid from output rid. #82163
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Enable SIMD #80797
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0] System.Console: allow terminfo files to be larger than 4KiB. #82082
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Console, 7.0.5
  • [HTTP/3] Attempt at using newer image to allow H/3 Windows stress #82226
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • Wasi icu test #82233
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Exclude things which broken on Loongarch #78850
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [wasi+browser] bundle timezones into .wasm #82250
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 8.0.0
  • Adding more SIMD constant folding support #82190
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Default media type used when 'null' is passed to StringContent #81506 #81722
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Adding HelloiOS sample for NativeAOT #82249
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add new System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations features #82311
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • More timeout checks in RegexOptions.NonBacktracking #74531
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Assign correct slots for open generic service descriptors during IEnumerable resolution #80410
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Enable constant folding in Tier0 #82412
  • [mono][interp] Add instrinsics for common Vector128 operations #81782
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • #78303 Draft: Add transformation ~v1 & v2 to VectorXxx.AndNot(v1, v2) #81993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix SafeHandle debug-only _ctorStackTrace for mono #82376
  • Fix HTTP3 header decoder buffer allocation #78862
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Refactor Logging.Console configure options #82254
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Implement native container types used by shared EventPipe code. #78852
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [Mono]: Add support for lazy runtime init in native-to-managed wrapper, similar to NativeAOT library build. #82253
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Remove the EnumCalendarInfo workaround from the pinvoke table … #82362
  • [eventpipe] Support arrays of primitive types as struct members #80493
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Proposed host runtime delegate for loading an assembly #82138
    area-Host
  • JIT: Lift remaining cmov restrictions by introducing GT_SELECTCC #82235
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Annotation changes only (part 2) #82388
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-vm and other directories in coreclr #82381
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-jit directory #82379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-pal and coreclr-debug directories #82380
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Deduplicate platform lists in BuildIntegration #82395
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-21

Issues

Created

  • Should we provide GitHub Actions workflows? #2200

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Pound Sign/Hashtag in Response File Breaks Deployments #30759
  • dotnet publish -p:PublishSingleFile fails with Unhandled exception on .net 7 it works on .net 6 #30758
  • Dotnet cannot resolve it's installed version while running dotnet run. #30748
  • [Bug]: Microsoft.NET.Sdk.targets(176,5): error MSB4018: The "GenerateDepsFile" task failed unexpectedly. #30755
  • System.Text.Json: The converter for derived type 'T' does not support metadata writes or reads. #30744

Closed

  • Build fails when using sdk version 7.0.100. #30735
  • dotnet new list ... - searchs project template tags #30127

PullRequests

Created

  • fix issue 30369 enable docker build platform switch #30762
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30756
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.9.2 to 19.10.0 in /eng/dependabot #30746
    dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #30741
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.9.2 to 19.10.0 in /eng/dependabot #30747
    dependencies, dependabot: main
  • Enable Dependabot for branch release/7.0.3xx #30580
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add tests for Nuget restore post action with the argument files #30693

Updated

  • #28518: Stop generating NETSDK1138 warning when OutputType is Library. #30612
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [25961] - dotnet watch first key press fix #26870
    area-System.Console
  • [GenAPI] Add DocIdSymbolFilter for doc-id API exclusion. #30740
    Area-GenAPI
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2119615 #30714
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Revert MSBuild to match VS 17.5.0 GA #30674
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.2xx
  • [GenAPI] Synthesize an internal default constructor for the type with implicit default constructor and the base type without. #30594
    Area-GenAPI
  • Allow multiple loggers for VSTest command #30686
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Enable debugging log #30732

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Add a syntax to create generic classes at runtime #6986

Updated

  • Can't use C# 8.0 using declaration with a discard #2235
    Backlog

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add roles spec covering static extensions #6880

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SDK 7.0.200 creates false positive CS0165, Use of unassigned local variable #66987
  • Intellisense shows wrong argument description on overloads if first suggestion is params #66984
  • Completions suggest unreachable variables in static local functions #66982
  • Allow IDE0250 (and other surface-area-impacting analyzers) to be customizable by visibility #66981
  • DocumentationCommentId for the global namespace is inconsistent #66976
  • ??= operator doesn't prevent IDE0052 info error to be shown #66975
  • error in update to 7.0.200 sdk #66973
  • DocumentationComment missing newline for member declarations #66972
  • Performance issue in NET 6 for classes with many properties #66969
  • Lightbulb performance improvements #66968
    17.6

Closed

  • Exception in `CSharpIntroduceParameterCodeRefactoringProvider` when callsites provide not enough arguments #63615
    17.6 P3
  • Better error recovery for statement directly inside a switch statement #66971
  • C# Task List doesn't display items #66872

PullRequests

Created

  • WIP: Sig help in progress #66988
  • Clean up test partition warnings #66986
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add some tests for implement implicitly/explicitly #66985
  • Use per-user temporary directories for AnalyzerAssemblyLoader #66983
    Community
  • Move AllCaptureTests to a Theory #66977
    Area-Compilers, Test
  • Add `<SourceGeneratorProjectReference>` MSBuild item type #66974
  • Async lightbulb performance improvement #66970
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Introduce Parameter - Fix crash #66402
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/lsp_configuration #66944
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Improve parser error recovery in malformed switch statements #66979
    Next
  • Parse parameter list on an interface in error recovery mode #66940
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Fix brokered service issues #66947
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Record buddies for roles/extensions feature #66980
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Delete service fetch that's not being used anyways #66945
    Area-IDE, Next
  • CodeStyleOption2 refactoring #66946
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Implement Required Members for VB #66084
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Clean and rename FeatureOnOffOptions #66881
    Area-IDE
  • Move all Document Outline update operations to background thread #65641
    Area-IDE
  • Rename options to editorconfig like name #66899
    Area-IDE
  • Add more using-alias-to-type tests #66889
    Area-Compilers
  • Add feature to suggest make struct members `readonly` #66954
  • Hoist address-of operators across await boundaries #66915
    Area-Compilers
  • Results of running 'make member readonly' on IDE #66957
  • Add nullability info field into discard expression #66309
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.6
  • Fix completions in range expressions #66959
    Community
  • Fix MSBuildWorkspace report warnings as failure #66710
    Area-IDE
  • Implemented `Make field/property required` codefix #66233
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add assert failure to fatal error helper #66524
    Area-IDE
  • Parse pointer to arrays #65432
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.5
  • Preserve empty NodeStateTable entries #66963
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MessagePack deserialization throws error when using Lz4BlockArray compression #46787
  • Support inferring parameters bound from JSON body or service #46786
    8.0-preview3
  • Support parameters bound from an array of types in RequestDelegateGenerator #46785
    8.0-preview3
  • net::ERR_CONTENT_LENGTH_MISMATCH 200 (OK) #46784
  • Increase timeout for project template tests to an hour #46782
    8.0-preview2
  • SpaProxy should not inject middleware with ASPNETCORE_HOSTINGSTARTUPASSEMBLIES #46780
  • ObjectDisposedException thrown on server shutdown due to disposed MemoryCache #46779
  • Kestrel server returns 500 status code (instead of 400) if client corrupts TLS encrypted data #46778
  • The "ComplexObjectModelBinder" instead of the "ComplexTypeModelBinder" class access type change issue #46775
  • .net 7 signalr Default authenticationSchemes not working #46774
  • Support F# `Async<'T>` as an awaitable type in minimal APIs #46773
    Backlog
  • Improve HttpResponse.OnCompleted and RegisterForDispose XML docs #46772

Closed

  • Analyzer to detect greater than 1 [FromBody] usage #45382
    8.0-preview2
  • [AOT] Add safe route value overloads to `Results` and `TypeResults` #46229
    8.0-preview2
  • Add RouteValueDictionary overloads to Http.Results #46542
    8.0-preview2
  • Support parameter binding for body or service parameters in RequestDelegateGenerator #46337
    8.0-preview2
  • Blazor component events not trigger in MVC partial view when calling via javascript #46663
  • [RDG] Optimize how EndpointFilterInvocationContext type is generated #46640
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor IJSRuntime.Invoke memory leak problem #46761
  • Identity schema versioning design / infrastructure #46274
    8.0-preview2
  • CheckSlidingExpiration is not called when using your own CookieAuthenticationEvents implementation #46776
    8.0-preview2
  • Blazor WebAssembly loading screen shows 101% loaded #46770
    8.0-preview2
  • AddRoutingCore(this IServiceCollection services) and RouteOptions updates for CreateSlimBuilder #46428
    8.0-preview2

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Bump template tests timeout #46783
    area-mvc, tell-mode, test-fixed, 6.0.x
  • Avoid more UnobservedTaskExceptions in SignalR .NET client #46781
    area-signalr

Merged

  • Greater than 1 FromBody analyzer. #46494
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview2
  • [AOT] Add Http.Results RouteValueDictionary overloads #46594
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview2
  • Add schema support infrastructure #46300
    area-identity, 8.0-preview2
  • CheckSlidingExpiration should use Events property #46777
    area-security, community-contribution, 8.0-preview2
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `376a7f3` to `a2880db` #46763
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview2
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `b73f27f` to `7a7231c` #46762
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview2

Updated

  • Productize QuickGrid #46573
    area-blazor
  • Remove JsonSerializerOptions copy in ProblemDetailsJsonOptionsSetup #46716
    area-runtime
  • TryParse support for request delegate source generator #46696
    area-runtime
  • Wait for Request to finish #46176
    servers-iis, area-runtime
  • SDK Bump to `8.0.100-preview.2.23113.1` #46328
    area-infrastructure
  • Expand FromX support and add route vs. query param inference #46715
    area-web-frameworks
  • Sections support #46727
    area-blazor
  • [release/7.0] Prefer TypeConverter over TryParse #46687
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0.x
  • Add WebViewManager.Dispatch() method #46644
    area-blazor
  • Defer search for dev cert until build bind time #46296
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Web.ProjectTemplates: exclude 'Program.cs' from all templates that replace it. #46769
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Introduce 'RenderTreeBuilder.AddComponentParameter()' #46562
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • Prevent NRE when body is not set #46564
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/7.0] Prevent NRE when body is not set #46613
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun, 7.0.x
  • Templates.Blazor.Tests: skip Playwright based tests when Playwright is not available. #46760
    area-blazor, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • dotnet-counters formatting broken in 8.0 #3665
    8.0.0
  • dotnet-trace EventSource no events #3667
    8.0.0
  • eeversion prints wrong mode #3581
    8.0.0
  • dotnet-trace always detects 100% CPU usage #3554
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Handle exception in System.Console.SetCursorPosition in some environments #3678

Merged

  • Add sosreset/sosflush commands/aliases #3650

Updated

  • Enable per provider filtering #3639
  • Add AssemblyLoadContext for loading extensions #3649
    8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Picking an item in a <Picker> element causes the element to vanish. #13493
  • Returning UIImage in custom ImageSourceService doesn't trigger an UI update #13490
  • [net7.0] [iOS] The content of the DataTemplate of the CarouselView is not positioned correctly #13489
  • Frame not using full width of the parent (StackLayout) when another element occupies the stack #13488
  • Shadow with a gradient brush does not work #13487
  • Vertical Stack Layout Content Exceeds Required Space #13485
  • Android Button (maybe other controls) problem #13483
  • iOS: erratic elements sizing with GridItemsLayout #13481
  • Title bar lags behind when resizing #13479
  • ObjCRuntime.RuntimeException has been thrown #13478
  • When I Capture a photo the second time the camera does not open #13477
  • [Enhancement] FontImageSource defaults and style #13474
  • Android: CollectionView.Scrolled returns wrong First/LastVisibleItemIndex when a Header/Footer is set #13471
  • SearchHandler doesn’t show results on iOS #13470
  • Frame Error display on Android devices #13469
  • iOS Binding library crash DYLD 4 Symbol missing #13464
  • MAUI dotnet Publish Signs msix but the exe is not Signed #13462

Closed

  • Error while restoring the dependencies of .NET MAUI App on .NET 8 #13492
  • Reopen issue number 7751 #13491
  • ObjCRuntime.RuntimeException has been thrown #13476
  • SVG extension Image does not work on ImageButton/Button #7066
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Windows] Cannot hide caption buttons from title bar #10057
    .NET 8 Planning
  • RefreshView pull to refresh executes refresh command in Android but not iOS #5316
    Backlog
  • Maui.Controls.Shapes.Shape threw an exception #13379
  • MAUI Blazor on Windows 11 KB5022845: MainWindow 'white blick' #13461
  • MessagingCenter is not thread safe #10670
    Backlog
  • How to use broadcast to receive messages triggered by three-party hardware in maui #13467
  • TabBar displays icons incorrectly on iOS. #13463
  • Visual Studio for Mac does not support setting TargetFramework settings for iOS/Mac Binding Libraries #13450

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk from 17.4.1 to 17.5.0 #13480
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Use the TextColor value to set the ClearButton color on the Entry #13475
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Housekeeping] Re-enabling the test #13473
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Don't propagate frame to platformview #13466

Merged

  • Source Generator Cancellation #13433
    backport/suggested
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview1] Revert "Add shell pages via controller instead of handler (#13332)" #13482
  • Revert "Add shell pages via controller instead of handler (#13332)" #13465

Updated

  • Simplification of user interface declaration in code #12728
    proposal/open, community ✨
  • Shell routing and Service registration automation #13402
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • move BootstrapHelper to Maui Core #13431
    partner/hot-reload-xaml
  • Handle renamed or deleted MauiImage files #13251
    area/single project ☝️
  • Show keyboard on Android entry/editor/searchbar focus #12890
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Windows] Add helper method to get GetFirstChildOfType with null support. #13421
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Include border size in windows MeasureOverride #13419
    area/layout 🔲
  • Add legacy Grid method (and a better one) #13408
    area/layout 🔲, layout-grid
  • Use the launcher to start the camera #13220
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [iOS] Don't scroll more than the available scrollable space #13415
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎, layout-scrollview
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #13434
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] Windows apps do not need GUIDs (remove check) #13034
    area/single project ☝️, do-not-merge, backport/suggested
  • Build maui.aar on CI #8943
  • [RadioButton] Fix Issue with BorderWidth, Incorrect spacing in Default Control Template. #13407
    area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • Bump System.Text.Json from 7.0.1 to 7.0.2 #13358
    do-not-merge, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [controls] fix memory leak in `Application.OpenWindow()` #13400
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Expose BlazorWebView.TryDispatchAsync() API for access to scoped services #13425
    area/blazor 🕸️, do-not-merge
  • Implement IAsyncDisposable on MauiApp #13424
    area/hosting 🧩

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Optionally map property if column exists, otherwise silently ignore #30322
  • Can't add migration renaming a column on TPC root #30321
  • Contains on a tuple collection doesn't work #30320
  • Add calculated properties unmapped to database #30319
  • model.GetEntityTypes() is empty inside overridden Generate method with DropTableOperation of custom SqlServerMigrationsSqlGenerator #30318
  • Left join on included entities are duplicated if accessing getter property #30317

Closed

  • Generated Model Snapshot throws InvalidOperationException #29534
    7.0.3
  • Json Column in EF Core translate my UTF-8 character to something like \u7BA1 #30316

PullRequests

Updated

  • Fix to #28816 - Json: add support for Sqlite provider #30302
  • Support JSON columns in compiled models #30254

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

PullRequests

Created

Merged

Updated

  • Change how VS setup authoring is configured. #15552
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #15583
